content:
Certainly! Here is the table you requested:

| Category | Description | Grouping | Coins | Market Volume |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Payments | Cryptocurrencies designed for facilitating peer-to-peer payments and money transfers | Use Case | Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Stellar | $200B+ |
| Store of Value | Cryptocurrencies designed to hold and preserve value over time | Use Case | Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Coin, Dogecoin, Cardano | $400B+ |
| Privacy Coins | Cryptocurrencies designed to provide enhanced privacy and anonymity for transactions | Use Case | Monero, Zcash, Dash, Pirate Chain, Beam | $5B+ |
| Decentralized Finance (DeFi) | Cryptocurrencies and blockchain-based applications designed for decentralized financial services | Use Case | Uniswap, Aave, Compound, Maker, SushiSwap | $60B+ |
| Gaming | Cryptocurrencies designed for in-game purchases and transactions | Use Case | Enjin Coin, Decentraland, WAX, The Sandbox, Chiliz | $2B+ |
| Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) | Cryptocurrencies designed for the creation, buying, and selling of unique digital assets | Use Case | CryptoPunks, Bored Ape Yacht Club, Art Blocks, Axie Infinity, Board Ape Kennel Club | $10B+ |
| Internet of Things (IoT) | Cryptocurrencies designed for enabling communication and payments between devices | Use Case | IOTA, Waltonchain, VeChain, Helium, IoTeX | $2B+ |
| Infrastructure | Cryptocurrencies designed to provide underlying technology and infrastructure for other blockchain-based applications | Technology | Ethereum, Polkadot, Solana, Cardano, Cosmos | $300B+ |
| Smart Contracts | Cryptocurrencies designed to execute and enforce self-executing contracts | Technology | Ethereum, Cardano, Solana, Polkadot, Binance Smart Chain | $300B+ |
| Proof of Stake (PoS) | Cryptocurrencies that utilize PoS consensus mechanism for |  |  |  |
